name: PETIT IDOLM@STER Twelve Seasons! Vol.2
summary: PETIT IDOLM@STER Twelve Seasons! Vol.2 is an album released by Media Factory at the price of ￥1260 on January 9, 2013. This CD includes two new songs by Chihaya Kisaragi, a solo version of the Puchimasu! theme La♪La♪La♪Wonderland, and an original drama track. Also included is an off vocal version of the first song featured on the CD.
info:
• 艺术家: 如月千早&ちひゃー(CV:今井麻美)
